column1: ID System: Number of Fiduciary and Related Asset Accounts

column2: Title
column4: Definition

column2: Fiduciary Powers Granted
column4: Institution has been granted trust powers by a state or national regulatory authority to administer accounts in a fiduciary capacity. Fiduciary capacity generally means: trustee, executor, administrator, registrar of stocks and bonds, transfer agent, guardian, assignee, receiver, custodian under a uniform gifts to minors act, investment advisor, any capacity in which the institution possesses investment discretion on behalf of another, or any similar capacity. Note:;Domestic offices of foreign banks (a.k.a. IBA’s -- as defined by the International Banking Act) report annually, as of December.; ;All institutions that have any fiduciary or related assets file this information annually each December. However, Quarterly data is ONLY available for institutions that have total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million AND gross fiduciary and related service income greater than 10% of the revenue from the preceding calendar year.;

column2: Fiduciary Power Exercised
column4: Institution or trust company subsidiary of the institution exercises fiduciary powers granted by a state or national regulatory authority to administer accounts in a fiduciary capacity. Fiduciary capacity generally means: trustee, executor, administrator, registrar of stocks and bonds, transfer agent, guardian, assignee, receiver, custodian under a uniform gifts to minors act, investment advisor, any capacity in which the institution possesses investment discretion on behalf of another, or any similar capacity. Note:;Domestic offices of foreign banks (a.k.a. IBA’s -- as defined by the International Banking Act) report annually, as of December.; All institutions that have any fiduciary or related assets file this information annually each December. However, Quarterly data is ONLY available for institutions that have total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million AND gross fiduciary and related service income greater than 10% of the revenue from the preceding calendar year.;

column2: Fiduciary Or Related Activity
column4: Beyond having trust powers granted and exercised, institutions with fiduciary assets accounts, income, or other reportable fiduciary related service. note:;domestic offices of foreign banks (a.k.a. IBA’s -- as defined by the International Banking Act) report annually, as of December.; All institutions that have any fiduciary or related assets file this information annually each December. However, Quarterly data is ONLY available for institutions that have total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million AND gross fiduciary and related service income greater than 10% of the revenue from the preceding calendar year.;

column2: Number of Fiduciary Accounts and Related Asset Accounts
column4: The total number of Fiduciary Accounts and Related Asset Accounts ris definition: idfranum = ttnanum + ttnmnum

column2: Number of Managed Accounts
column4: The total number of managed accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Personal Trust and Agency Accounts
column4: The total number of managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Employee Benefit-Defined Contribution Accounts
column4: The number of account for all employee benefit defined contribution accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Employee Benefit-Defined Benefit Accounts
column4: The number of employee benefit defined benefit accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Other Employee Benefit and Retirement-Related Accounts
column4: The number of all other retirement related fiduciary accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Corporate Trust and Agency Accounts
column4: The number of accounts held by the institution for all corporate trust and agency accounts held in managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Managed investment Management  and investment Advisory Agency Accounts
column4: The number of all individual and institutional investment management agency accounts administered within the fiduciary area of the institution, held in managed asset accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: # of Foundation and Endowment Trust and Agency Accounts, Managed Assets
column4: Number Of All Institutional Foundations And EndowmentsFor Which The Institution Serves As Either Trustee Or Agent That Are Held In Managed Asset Accounts.  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The Prior Calendar Year. (2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Number of Other Fiduciary Accounts
column4: The number of all other trust and agencies not reported in FFIEC Call Report Schedule RC-T line 4 through line 7 and held in managed asset accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Fiduciary Accounts Held in Foreign Offices
column4: The number of fiduciary accounts held in foreign offices - managed assets note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: # of individual Retirement, Health Savings, and Similar Accounts,Managed Assets
column4: Number Of Individual Retirement Accounts, Health SavingsAccounts And Other Similar Accounts That Are Held InManaged Asset Accounts (Included In Schedule RC-T Items5.C And 11)  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The Prior Calendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: # of investments of Managed Fiduciary Accts in Advised Or Sponsored Mutual Funds
column4: Managed Assets Held In Fiduciary Accounts:Number Of Managed Fiduciary Accounts In Advised OrSponsored Mutual Funds  Note: Reported As A Memoranda Item In The December QuarterOnly

column2: Number of Non-Managed Accounts
column4: The total number of non-managed accounts reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year.

column2: Number of Personal Trust and Agency Accounts
column4: The total number of non-managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Employee Benefit-Defined Contribution Accounts
column4: The number of employee benefit defined contribution accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in non-managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Employee Benefit-Defined Benefit Accounts
column4: The number of employee benefit defined benefit accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in non-managed fiduciary accounts note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number Non-Managed  Other Employee Benefit and Retirement-Related Accounts
column4: The number of all other retirement related fiduciary accounts in which the institution serves as either trustee or agent and funds are held in non managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Corporate Trust and Agency Accounts
column4: The number of accounts held by the institution for all corporate trust and agency accounts held in non-managed fiduciary accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: # of investment Management and Advisory Agency Accounts, Non-Managed Assets
column4: Number Of All Individual And Institutional InvestmentManagement And Investment Advisory Agency AccountsAdministered Within The Fiduciary Area Of The Institution,Held In Non-Managed Asset Accounts  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With TotalFiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (PriorDecember) Or With Fiduciary And Related ServicesIncome Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net InterestIncome Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Number of Foundation and Endowment Trust and Agency Accounts
column4: Number Of All Institutional Foundations And EndowmentsFor Which The Institution Serves As Either Trustee Or AgentThat Are Held In Non-Managed Asset Accounts   Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)

column2: Number of Other Fiduciary Accounts
column4: The number of all other trust and agencies not reported in schedule FFIEC Call Report Schedule RC-T line 4 through line 7 and held in non-managed asset accounts. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: Number of Custody and Safekeeping Accounts
column4: The number of personal and institutional custody and safekeeping accounts held by the institution. Safekeeping and custody accounts are a type of agency account in which the reporting institution performs one or more specified agency functions but the institution is not a trustee and also is not responsible for managing the the asset selection for account assets. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior december) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. all others only report in december.

column2: Number of Fiduciary Accounts Held in Foreign Offices
column4: The number of fiduciary accounts held in foreign offices - non-managed assets. note: reported quarterly by institutions with total fiduciary assets of greater than $250 million (prior December) or with fiduciary and related services income of greater than 10% of revenue (net interest income plus noninterest income) for the prior calendar year. All others only report in December.

column2: # of individual Retirement,Health Savings and Similar Accounts, Non-Managed Asts
column4: Number Of Individual Retirement Accounts, Health SavingsAccounts And Other Similar Accounts That Are Held In Non-Managed Asset Accounts (Included In Schedule RC-T Items5.C And 11)  Note: 1) Reported Quarterly By Institutions With Total Fiduciary Assets Greater Than $250 Million (Prior December) Or With Fiduciary And Related Services Income Greater Than 10% Of Revenue (Net Interest Income Plus Noninterest Income) For The PriorCalendar Year.(2) All Other December Only (IBA'S)
